# Contributing

## Feedback, comments, or suggestions

To provide feedback, comments, or suggestions, submit an issue on the [issues page](https://github.com/rapidsurveys/ramOPmanual/issues).

## Code contributions

-   Fork this repository to your Github account

-   Clone your forked version on to your machine

``` bash
git clone https://github.com/<yourgithubusername>/ramOPmanual.git
```

-   Make sure to track progress upstream i.e., on our version of `ramOPmanual` at `rapidsurveys/ramOPmanual`, by doing

``` bash
git remote add upstream https://github.com/rapidsurveys/ramOPmanual.git
```

-   Before making changes make sure to pull changes in from `upstream` by doing either `git fetch upstream` then merge later or `git pull upstream` to fetch and merge in one step

-   Make your changes on a new feature branch

-   Push up changes to your forked version

-   Submit a pull request at `rapidsurveys/ramOPmanual`
